subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A Central Michigan alumnus basks in the glow of the No. 1 overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, Eric Fisher, a Chippewa and now a Chief.
snippet: A Central Michigan alumnus basks in the glow of the No. 1 overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, Eric Fisher, a Chippewa and now a Chief.
